channel.title: Apax [637/639] Economy
channel.description:
[CENTER] Base : Dementhium
Apax is going to be a economy based pking server with many skills working and a lot of fun stuff to do for the players. We will have many minigames/quests and alot of other fun stuff Highscores will be added for players to compete with one another. We are trying to create a fun experience for every kind of player whether you are a skiller/pvmer/pker you will always have something to do.
[B]Media[/B]
[img]http://puu.sh/5ymXU.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/5ynde.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/5ynhI.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/5ynwq.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/5ynzN.png[/img]
[/CENTER]

item.description:
@FearTheMoon wrote:

Nice server, contact me on Skype: " N3rdscape ". I am very interested in helping you in community management.
